sourcesContent:
Profile Search Results

{{result.username}}

 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service'; import { UserNavComponent } from '../../user-nav/user-nav.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search', templateUrl: './search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search.component.css'] }) export class SearchComponent { results: any[] = [] currentUser = localStorage.getItem('sessionUser') constructor( private userService : UserService){} ngOnInit(){ if (this.userService) this.results = this.userService.sendSearchResults() for (let result of this.results) { if (result.username === this.currentUser) { const indexToRemove = this.results.indexOf(result); if (indexToRemove !== -1) { this.results.splice(indexToRemove, 1); } } } } sendUsername(username: any){ this.userService.sendUsernameToProfile(username) console.log('the data is',username) } }
